item.title: Add Picture In Blog
item.description: In this essay, we will talk about how to add a picture in blog.

item.title: What Is Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a static site generator written in Go. Originally created by Steve Francia in 2013, Hugo has seen a great increase in both features and performance thanks to current lead developer Bj√∏rn Erik Pedersen (since v0.14 in 2015[4]) and other contributors. Hugo is an open source project licensed under the Apache License 2.0.[5]
